entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a professor who is helping Harry with his problem. He is described as drawing the Marauders Map out of his pocket and unfolding it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is in pain due to a trick step. He is trying to get help from Professor Moody.

entities.name: marauders map
entities.description: The Marauders Map is a magical object that shows the layout of Hogwarts. It is described as being unfolded by Professor Moody.

entities.name: harr y
entities.description: Harr y is another person who is present in the scene and is hoping to get pulled out of the staircase soon.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a professor whose office was broken into. His name is mentioned by Professor Moody.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is the person who broke into Snape's office. His name is mentioned by Harry.

relationships.description: Moody has the Marauders Map, which he unfolds to examine it.
Harry saw Crouch break into Snape's office on the Marauders Map.
Moody is concerned about Snape's office being broken into, as mentioned by him to Harry.
Harry gets help from Moody in getting his leg free from the trick step.
